      ProbabilityDistribution<T> ProbabilityDistribution.linearCombination(double d1, double d2, ProbabilityDistribution<T> other)
      Makes a linear combination of this distribution "p1" and the given distribution "other" and the given parameters, i.e. it returns a P with P(i)=d1 P1(i) + d2 P2(i) for every interpretation i.
